title: Under Apron
description: pounded indigo, diamond shape apron with added batik bib(with 2 ties) at top; lower half has sections of geometric embroidery in red, green, yellow and white divided by 1/4\" red metallic tape; three 3/4\" attached embroidered medallions at middle of apron; 1\" loops on both sides
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
